title: How to get your first job as a self taught programmer
description: In this blog, I share my personal experience on how I landed my first job as a self-taught programmer, and provide tips and advice for those who are also trying to break into the industry without a formal degree or education.

title: How can you survive in market place in this competitive world
description: With the increasing competition in the job market, it can be challenging to stand out and secure a job. In this blog, I share my strategies and tips for surviving and thriving in the competitive world of programming.

title: Leading as a Junior developer first,then as a senior developer
description: Becoming a successful developer requires not only technical skills, but also leadership and communication skills. In this blog, I share my journey from a junior developer to a senior developer and provide insights on how to lead effectively in a development team.

title: Be yourself , keep faith on you, oneday you will succeeded inshaallah
description: Becoming a successful developer requires not only technical skills, but also leadership and communication skills. In this blog, I share my journey from a junior developer to a senior developer and provide insights on how to lead effectively in a development team.
